extendedInfo.description: Full version includes 300+ phrases to help you on your travels around sunny Spain.+ Phrases are sorted into categories to help you get the phrase you want quickly and easily.+ Phrases also come with the correct pronunciation of each word.Categories include:- General Phrases- Numbers- Emergencies- Transport- Accommodation- Money- Food / Dining- Bars / Clubs- Shopping - DrivingWith a beautiful interface, this handy phrase book will make traveling easier, safer and more fun.Keywords: spanish, learn spanish, spanish phrase book, spanish phrases, phrases, language, learn new language, translator, spanish translator.

reviews.title: Great, but...
reviews.comment: I like it. Handy and easy to find phrases. Would be great if when you tap the phrase it said it out loud :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea
reviews.comment: It\'s about time someone did this! Very useful
reviews.author: A Google User
